mapper.insert: INSERT INTO timeline (time_user_id, day, time_title, time_content, time_public_yn) VALUES (#{time_user_id}, #{day}, #{time_title}, #{time_content}, #{time_public_yn})
mapper.update: UPDATE timeline SET day = #{day}, time_title = #{time_title}, time_content = #{time_content}, time_public_yn = #{time_public_yn}, time_update_date = NOW() WHERE time_idx = #{time_idx} AND time_user_id = #{time_user_id}
mapper.select: SELECT time_user_id FROM timeline WHERE time_idx = #{time_idx}
SELECT * FROM timeline WHERE time_user_id = #{id} ORDER BY day ASC
SELECT * FROM timeline WHERE time_public_yn = 'true' ORDER BY day ASC
